# Change Log

## [Unreleased]

## [2.0.0] - 2018-11-08
### Changed
- Changed the API for TypeScript

## [1.0.0] - 2018-11-02
### Changed
- Fix the API
- No JSX in library code

## [0.6.0] - 2018-10-25
### Changed
- Non nullable updaters

## [0.5.0] - 2018-10-18
### Added
- Various examples

- Fix dist up to date
- Update devDependencies
